name: DREAM TOGETHER
description:
Play alone or with a friend in co-op!
Co-op with controllers is highly recommended. 

Two lovers from different sides of the sleep dimension fight together in a harsh dreamland adventure. 

Four extremely challenging areas and one ruthless boss await you. 
For a true challenge, collect all ten Dream Orbs in every level.

----

Programming and level design by Joseph Quested

Art, music and sound design by Phoebe Curtin

----

Controls:

Player 1
move: left and right arrows
jump / climb: up arrow
drop: down arrow
attack: right alt

Player 2
move: A + D
jump / climb: W
drop: S
attack: T

CONTROLLER
move / drop: d-pad or control stick
jump / climb: A / X
attack: B/ circle
